issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:

comments.body:
Hello, What version of ti SDK you are using. Try the latest SDK 5.2.0.GA. Try running the "ti sdk select" in terminal and select the SDK 5.2.0.GA as selected sdk. Now, Run "ti info". Attach the output log as a text file in this ticket.

Go to the studio/view log file and attach the log as a text file in this ticket.

Please attach the necessary files. Thanks.
